tool_description: Validates potential bird species against their known geographic ranges and distribution patterns.
error_messages: Empty species list: Provide at least one candidate species name.
Invalid coordinates: Latitude must be between -90 and 90, longitude between -180 and 180.
Species not found: One or more species names not recognized in database.
Too many candidates: Limit to 50 species for processing efficiency.
usage: Provide candidate_species list with observation coordinates. Returns filtered species list based on geographic probability.

likely_species.description: Species with confirmed ranges at observation location

possible_species.description: Species with marginal or seasonal ranges

unlikely_species.description: Species outside normal range but potentially vagrant
